content: lion brand pattern # 20178 *cwetq-earflaphat pdf* skill level intermediate level 3 size child 9-10 tween/teen 8-16 adult medium finished circumference 19½ 21½ 23 inches wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 1 ball *ed note may require 2 balls to complete larger sizes * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm worked from the top down in the round ear flaps are worked in row finish includes tassels attached to ear flaps and chained loop on top wool-ease thick & quick knit version earflap hat #20178 knit 1 wool-ease aran weight versions earflap hat #20182 crochet 2 earflap hat #20182 knit 3 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/earflap-hat-20178-knit 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/earflap-hat-20182-crochet 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/earflap-hat-20182-knit
